articles.author: Abeer Salman, Hadas Gold
articles.title: Palestinians to let US examine bullet that killed Al Jazeera journalist Shireen Abu Akleh - CNN
articles.description: The Palestinian Authority will allow US investigators to examine the bullet that killed Palestinian-American journalist Shireen Abu Akleh, PA Attorney General Akram Al Khatib announced Saturday.
articles.content:

articles.title: People planning to attend AIDS conference in Montreal still struggling to get visas - North Shore News
articles.description: MONTREAL — International AIDS organizations say people from Africa, South America and Asia who are planning to attend a major AIDS conference in Montreal are still struggling to get visas from the Canadian government.
